name: Seven Seasonings
description:
a story of seawater, herbal magic and fermented cabbage;

with superfluous trading and dice rolls. 

~

made for NaNoRenO 2019

contains strong language

around 8k words / 1 hour in length

~

I accidentally made too much music! You'll find a couple of bonus tracks in a folder called bonus audio. There are a few more bonus tracks in the soundtrack collection too.
